details: I manage the school's technical infrastructure, solving computer and software-related issues quickly and efficiently.

During the training, I actively participated in both individual and team projects and added them to my portfolio.
I regularly communicated with customers to plan and follow up on weekly and monthly orders.

I established effective communication with doctors to increase the prescription rates of the products.
I set daily sales targets with my team and actively performed field sales.

I conducted one-on-one meetings with potential customers and sold infrastructure services in the region.
